examples.example: 只要我们做好充分准备，这次任务就一定能顺利完成。

translate.english: As long as we make full preparations, this task will definitely be successfully completed.

examples.example: 我相信只要努力付出，未来的人生道路一定会很顺利。

translate.english: I believe that as long as one makes efforts, the future life path will surely be very smooth.

examples.example: 祝愿你接下来的所有事情都能顺利进行。

translate.english: Wish all the following things of yours can go smoothly.
